item.title: Holt to Newsmax: 'Good Move' for Trump to Pause Ukraine Aid
item.description: Retired U.S. Air Force Brig. Gen. Blaine Holt praised on Newsmax President Donald Trump's decision to pause all aid to Ukraine.
